alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT COCONINO AND YAVAPAI COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM MST... At 528 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Munds Mountain Wilderness, or 9 miles southeast of Sedona, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail..elevations above 6500 could see heavy snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stoneman Lake, Bar T Bar Ranch, Munds Mountain Wilderness, Wet Beaver Wilderness, Apache Maid Mountain, Schnebly Hill Overlook, and Red Rock Visitor Center. This includes Interstate 17 between mile markers 302 and 319. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
